MichaelPriest

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • MichaelPriest.Config

  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all the files used in the application, either when files are being written (saving) or read (loading).

    Text files (.txt) are used as the file type for saving/loading in the format below:

    • World Width
    • World Height
    • Cycles
    • Food Density
    • Rock Density
    • Animal1 Species
    • Animal1 Name
    • Animal1 Symbol
    • Animal1 X Position
    • Animal1 Y Position
    • Animal1 Energy
    • Animal1 Type
    • Animal2 Species
    • etc...
    Author:
    Michael Priest
